page.title: 17RECREATION - SPORTS FIELD
page.content: We were told the Village Hall was built in 1962, and everyone uses it; playgroup, luncheon club, guides, brownies, badminton. They use it for weddings and parties and bonfire night. I went to the village hall. There were 2 toilets, a kitchen, a big hall with a stage. The Jubilee room was built in 1977. At the playing fields I went on an American swing with 6 seats. There were 19 steps on the slide. There were 10 swings and a rocking horse with 5 seats. There was a see-saw. The football club play on Sunday mornings. The cricket club play on Saturdays and Sundays from May to September. In the holidays, I went to the cricket pitch. I got all grassy because my dad tipped all the mowings in a pile and I jumped in it.
